title: BEST WAY TO SPEND VS TOKENS?

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Download the free app for Windows, Mac, browsers, and mobile to save what you see.

body: What is your opinion about spending your VS Tokens as good as possible? Leave your thoughts down bellow :)

replies.body: They give exactly the same stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Evusmp6A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-27T21:47:56.865+0000)
>
> They give exactly the same stuff.

I know, and that wasnt my question :p

wolf orb gives more skins potentially,
lion orb gives more OE potentially
garen is ahead on euw and on na too. im proud of you guys.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Evusmp6A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-27T22:34:01.301+0000)
>
> garen is ahead on euw and on na too. im proud of you guys.

Where can u see that? :O

> [{quoted}](name=LAFFEN,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Evusmp6A,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-27T23:00:42.492+0000)
>
> Where can u see that? :O

in your client should be a "vs. event" tab. you can see it in the top right corner. "the war favours god-king garen" atm.

if you dont have the tab, you need to restart the client.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Evusmp6A,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-06-27T23:04:28.294+0000)
>
> in your client should be a "vs. event" tab. you can see it in the top right corner. "the war favours god-king garen" atm.
> 
> if you dont have the tab, you need to restart the client.

Thank you!
how do u check whos ahead r not?
It says in the upper right corner of the home screen.  Garen is currently winning
I have 210 tokens so far, and the missions expire today...I think I completed all the missions that were released.
okay but how do i spend the tokens? im still lost on that
